data.text:
Room was clean and all we needed 
The man on Reception was brilliant, very friendly and checked us in quickly.  
Breakfast was very Basic.   But coffee and toast was enough.    The Location is so good.  
5 minute walk from La rambla and placa Cataylunya. (where Airport bus picks up)
data.title: 2 days in cheap & cheerful Hostel

data.text: I had an awful experience with this hostel. I booked it and then received an email saying the room rates were much higher and so I cancelled it immediately. I was still charged however for the full amount despite my protest and refused a refund even though I cancelled it imeediately due to being misled over room rates.
data.title: Avoid

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We apologize for the inconvenience you faced. It's regrettable that the room rates were higher than expected, leading to a cancellation.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
owner_response.author: RECEPTION SAFESTAY

data.text: Safestay? More like unsafestay. A man lay in the centre of our room with his hand where the sun don’t shine. Dare I need to say more. This only got more intense. Encouraged by friendly Australians, we told reception that we can barely enter our room because of what he’s doing. The receptionist quite frankly needs a different job (eg not working with people) as his solution to this problem was to try and move half of us girls to a different room, leaving just one with this dodgy man. Well done very clever
data.title: UnsafeStay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We're deeply sorry to hear about your distressing experience at the hostel. Such incidents are completely unacceptable, and we apologize for the discomfort caused. Your safety and well-being are of utmost importance to us, and we take this matter seriously. We'll investigate the situation and take appropriate measures to prevent any recurrence. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we hope you consider giving us another chance to provide a better experience in the future.
owner_response.author: RECEPTION SAFESTAY

data.text: I disliked my stay at the hostel. The elevator was broken, so I had to carry my 20+ kg/50 lbs of luggage up 5 flights of stairs and had to walk up 5 flights every time I went out to get back to my room. Further, my key card stopped working twice, so I had climb up and down a total of 10 flights of stairs to get it fixed. The bathrooms are very dirty and smelly. Further, there was a very creepy old man in the room hitting on guests and jerking off.... I do not recommend this hostel.
data.title: Broken and Smelly Hostel with Creepy Guests

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We're sorry for the troubles you faced during your stay. The inappropriate behavior in the room is unacceptable and we take this seriously and will address the problems to ensure a better experience for our guests. Your feedback is important, and we apologize for the inconvenience caused.
owner_response.author: RECEPTION SAFESTAY

data.text: The only good thing is the location. terribly dirty. nothing works. shower like in a prison. will not come back . I wanted to love with girls, but they don’t have this function, breakfast is bad also . I want to leave my backpack just for one hour, to go to have a normal breakfast in a normal place, you should pay for holding your pack pack) first time I seee this thing
data.title: Only for one night

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We apologize for the disappointments during your stay. We'll address the cleanliness and facilities issues. Sorry for any inconvenience with the backpack policy; we'll review it for improvement. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope to provide a better experience next time.
owner_response.author: RECEPTION SAFESTAY
